message: This guy has only one single answer (no questions) on StackOverflow!!
name: javascript - Develop nodejs with visual studio 2010 - Stack Overflow
caption: stackoverflow.com
description: Is it possible to develop NodeJS applications with VS2010. I'm talking plain ol' Javascript, not Azure or any fancy stuff like that. I just want to use VS2010 as the Javascript editor as I'm from .NET background and I'm very comfortable with it.

data.message: Probably, I'm misunderstanding something.. What's exactly significant here?

the question is a bit tricky, and the answer itself is kind of a clever hack. You can tell by the number of up-votes for example. It is interesting this guy doesn't have any other question or answer on SO, ever. Put aside the fact he seems to live in another planet with this localised VS, and already has huge issues in learning things with his obviously v. poor English.
